hibernate-mapping.query: select fm.id from com.sitescape.ef.security.function.Function function join function.operationNames operationName, com.sitescape.ef.security.function.WorkAreaFunctionMembership fm join fm.memberIds memberId where function.zoneName=:zoneName and fm.zoneName=:zoneName and fm.workAreaId=:workAreaId and fm.workAreaType=:workAreaType and operationName=:operationName and function.id=fm.functionId and memberId in (:principalIds)

select fm.id from com.sitescape.ef.security.function.Function function join function.operationNames operationName, com.sitescape.ef.security.function.WorkAreaFunctionMembership fm join fm.memberIds memberId where function.zoneName=:zoneName and fm.zoneName=:zoneName and fm.workAreaId=:workAreaId and fm.workAreaType=:workAreaType and operationName=:operationName and function.id=fm.functionId and memberId in (:principalIds)
